channel.title: Heroes of Might and Magic Online
channel.description:
http://homm.91.com/
Looks pretty good, i'm awaiting server to go up so that i can try it. The only con i see is that it's going to have a fucking cash shop :mad:

item.description:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:2, topic:339299”]its going to be raped by the Chinese. I’ve seen them play games a very scary sight.[/quote]Shame… it could have such huge potential, homm is an awesome game series
